pma:database.name: neogame
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `battlemoves` ( `id` int(3) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `strID` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `strName` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `strNotes` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `strSuccess` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `strFail` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `strPopUp` longtext, `vChanceType` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0,0,0', `vUsConditions` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `vThemConditions` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `vPairConditions` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `vUsFailConditions` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `vThemFailConditions` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `vPairFailConditions` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `vUsPreConditions` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `vThemPreConditions` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `nSeeThem` int(1) DEFAULT '2', `nSeeUs` int(1) DEFAULT '2', `bAllOutOfRange` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `bInAttackRange` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `nMinCharges` int(4) DEFAULT '0', `nMinRange` int(4) DEFAULT '-1', `nMaxRange` int(4) DEFAULT '-1', `nAttackModeType` int(4) DEFAULT '-1', `vHexTypes` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `fChance` float DEFAULT '1', `fPriority` float DEFAULT '0', `fDetect` float DEFAULT '1', `fOrder` float DEFAULT '0.5', `fFatigue` float DEFAULT '0', `bApproach` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `bOffense` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `bFallBack` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `bRetreat` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `bPosition` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `bPassive` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=64 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Fall Back Under Cover Move 1 space away from target, maintaining cover. Must see target. Low chance of tripping on terrain. Chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Melee Attack Use current melee attack on target. Must see target. Low chance of making you vulnerable. High chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Take Cover Dive behind best cover terrain can provide. Must be at least 1 space away from all enemies. Low chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Sneak Towards Move 1 space closer to target while staying hidden. Must see target, and target must not see you yet. Low chance of tripping on terrain. Low chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: <us> tries to sneak out of battle from <them>...but can't get away!

Sneaky Retreat Try to sneak out of battle without being seen. Chance to move one space away from target if escape fails. Must see target, and target must not see you yet. Low chance of tripping on terrain. Low chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Run! Move 2-4 spaces away from target. Must see target. Removes cover. Makes you vulnerable. High chance of tripping on terrain. High chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Advance Move 1 space closer to target. Must see target. Removes cover. Chance of tripping on terrain. Chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Advance Under Cover Move 1 space closer to target, maintaining cover. Must see target. Low chance of tripping on terrain. Chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Search Scan area for hidden targets. Must not see target yet.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Charge! Move 2-3 spaces towards target. Must see target. Removes cover. Makes you vulnerable. High chance of tripping on terrain. High chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Parry Parry target's next attack, making you much harder to hit. Must be in melee range. Must see target. Chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: <us> tries to kick <them> while they're down...but misses!

Kick Kick target while they're down. Chance to injure target, plus keep them fallen and force them to lose 1 turn. Must be in melee range. Must see target. High chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Roll Dodge Roll from target, making you harder to hit. Chance to move 1 space away from target. Must see target. High chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Pull Down Reach for target and attempt to throw off their footing. Chance to injure target and knock them down. Must be in melee range. Must see target. High chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: <us> desperately tries to retreat from <them>...but can't get away!

Desperate Retreat Move 1-2 spaces away from target and try to leave the battlefield, based on enemy numbers and proximities, movement rates, etc. Must not be in melee range from any enemy. Removes cover. Makes you vulnerable. High chance of tripping on terrain. High chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Sneak Away Move 1 space away from target while hiding. Must see target, and target must not see you yet. Low chance of tripping on terrain. Low chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Ranged Attack Use current ranged attack on target. Must see target. Low chance of making you vulnerable. Chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Get Up Stand up from being prone.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Blind Attack Try to melee attack an unseen target. Slim chance to hit target. Must be in melee range.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: <us> launches a flurry of attacks at <them>...and hits!
<us> tries to launch a flurry of attacks at <them>...but misses!

Melee Surge Launch a flurry of melee attacks at target. Chance to hit target 1-3 times, and stun them for 1 turn. Automatically lose 1 turn. Must be in melee range. Must see target. High chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: <us> tries to retreat from <them>...but can't get away!
Retreat Try to leave the battlefield, based on enemy numbers and proximities, movement rates, etc. Must be out of all enemies' ranges. Removes cover.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Tackle Target Dive at target, moving 1 space closer and trying to knock them down. Chance to knock down target and make them lose 1 turn. Automatically fall and lose cover. Must see target. High chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Blast Away Launch a volley of ranged attacks at target. Chance to hit target 3 times, forcing them to take cover and suppressing them. Must see target. High chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Fall Back Move 1 space away from target. Must see target. Removes cover. Chance of tripping on terrain. Chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Shoot Blindly Use current ranged attack against an unseen target. Slim chance to hit target.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Dodge Dodge the target's next attack, making you harder to hit. Chance to move 1 space away from target. Must see target. Chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Blind Retreat Choose a random direction, and run! Removes cover. Makes you vulnerable. High chance of tripping on terrain. High chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Threaten Raise weapon and threaten to use it. Both you and target must see each other.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Sprint Away! Move 3-5 spaces away from all visible targets. Must see target. Removes cover. Makes you vulnerable. High chance of tripping on terrain. High chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: <us> tries to lure <them> into a trap...but fails!

Lure Try to use the environment against target. Move 1 space away from target. Chance to knock down target and make them lose 1 turn. Chance to damage target. Both you and target must see each other. Makes you vulnerable. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Headbutt Headbutt the target. Chance to injure target, knock them down, and force them to lose 1 turn. Must be in melee range. Target must not be fallen. Must see target. High chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Leg Trip Try to trip the target. Chance to knock down target. Must be in melee range. Must see target. Both you and target must not be fallen. High chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Create Obstacle Knocks some debris, a log, or other item towards target. Chance to make them lose 1 turn. Chance to knock them down. Chance to damage target. Must see target. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Leap at Target Leap at target, moving 2 spaces closer and trying to knock them down. Chance to knock down target and make them lose 1 turn. Must see target. Automatically lose cover. High chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: <us> tries to trample <them> while they're down...but misses!

Trample Trample the target while they're down. Injures target, plus keeps them fallen and forces them to lose 1 turn. Must be in melee range. Must see target. High chance of being detected if hidden. Not always available.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Call Melonhead Cry out to nearby melonheads for help.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Leap Away! Move 2-3 spaces away from target. Must see target. Removes cover. Makes you vulnerable. High chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Check Body for Loot Check an unconscious body for any useful items, emptying them onto the ground. Must be in melee range. Must see target. Same penalty as accessing inventory.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column:
Surrender to Target
**CAUTION**
Drop all your items, and offer your surrender. Both you and target must see each other.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Demand Target's Surrender! Demand target to drop all items and walk away. Both you and target must see each other.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Accept Target's Surrender Accept target's offer to surrender. Target drops all items and walks away. Both you and target must see each other. Target must have previously offered surrender.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column:
Agree to Surrender
**CAUTION**
Accept target's demand for surrender. Drop all your items, and leave battle. Both you and target must see each other. Target must have previously demanded surrender.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Surrender to Target Drop all your items, and offer your surrender. Both you and target must see each other.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: <us> tries to steal <them>'s eyes... but misses!
Steal Eyes Steal target's eyes. Must see target. Low chance of making you vulnerable. High chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Ditch Vehicle Abandon vehicle, freeing you to run. Makes you harder to hit this turn. Drops equipped vehicle onto the ground. Must be using a vehicle that can be quickly discarded.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Offer to Talk Offer to stop battle with target and begin talks. If any combatants still want to fight, battle continues. Distracts you for 1 turn. Must see target.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Offer Ceasefire Offer to stop battle with target. If any combatants still want to fight, battle continues. Distracts you for 1 turn. Must see target.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Accept Ceasefire Accepts target's offer to stop battle. If any combatants still want to fight, battle continues. Must see target.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Reveal Self Make yourself visible to target. Target must not see you yet.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Accept Offer to Talk Accept target's offer to talk. If any combatants still want to fight, battle continues. Must see target.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Radio DMC Drone Call in drone support fire. Marks target as enemy of DMC if they don't stand down.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Crawl Towards Move 1 space closer to target. Must see target. Chance of tripping on terrain. Chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Crawl Away Move 1 space away from target. Must see target. Chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Advance Move 1 space closer to target. Must see target. Removes cover. Chance of tripping on terrain. Chance of being detected if hidden.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Wait Wait for one turn, doing nothing.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: <us> tries to crawl away from <them>...but can't get away!
Retreat (Crawl) Try to leave the battlefield, based on enemy numbers and proximities, movement rates, etc. Must be out of all enemies' ranges. Removes cover.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Radio DMC Drone Call in drone support fire.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Search Scan area for hidden targets. Must not see target yet.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Vanish from Sight Disappears from battle without being seen. Must see target.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Exploit Weakness Seeks a weakness to exploit in target, helping future attacks against it. Must see target.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Intimidate Explode with unbridled rage, scaring target. Both you and target must see each other.

table.name: battlemoves
table.column: Lethal Trap Leads target into a deadly situation, killing it. Must be closer to target than 4 spaces. Both you and target must see each other. Rarely available.
